item.title: Functional programming
item.description: Functional programming (FP) is a style of programming that relies on the creation of atomic, immutable functions, as opposed to relying on classes such as in object oriented programming.

item.title: Ramda
item.description: Ramda is a Javascript library that emphasizes on writing pure Functional programming. It takes a moment to understand the power and beauty of using it, especially that its patterns are different than usual.

item.title: React
item.description: I have been programming the web for over a decade now, and I saw how front end frameworks evolved from jQuery, to backbone, ember, angular, and finally React and vue.
